SUBSECTION.TITLE: The API
SUBSECTION.P: Mad-MPI implements almost all of the functionalities of the MPI standard. Some additional functionalities have been added to provide users with the facilities of the underlying NewMadeleine communication engine. The complete API is available at the following URL: \begin{quote} http://pm2.gforge.inria.fr/newmadeleine/html/group__mpi__interface.html \end{quote}

LI.P: If you wish to start your application under the debugger, you can use the option -d. All the processes of the MPI application will be launched through gdb, the GNU debugger.
If you wish to start your application under valgrind, you can use the option -valgrind.
